name: thenavigo-open-source
description: Thenavigo is an online Q&A community. It is built conscientious atmosphere, connecting elites from all sectors. They share their expertise, experience and knowledge on a variety topics.

scripts.test: npm run fmt-check && npm run validate-codes
scripts.fmt-check: prettier -c communities.json || (npm run fmt && git diff && exit 1)

author: Patrick Biyaga
